sentence.value: Viktor Ivanovich Patsayev (Russian: ??????? ????????? ???????; June 19, 1933 – June 30, 1971) was a Soviet cosmonaut who flew on the Soyuz 11 mission and had the unfortunate distinction of being part of the second crew to die during a space flight.

sentence.value: On board the space station Salyut 1 he operated the Orion 1 Space Observatory (see Orion 1 and Orion 2 Space Observatories), he became the first man to operate a telescope outside the Earth’s atmosphere.

sentence.value: After a normal re-entry, the capsule was opened and the crew was found dead.
sentence.annotated-sentence: After a normal re-entry, the capsule was opened and the crew was found dead.
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: After a normal re-entry, the capsule was opened and the crew was found dead.
sentence.tree: det(re-entry/NN-4,a/DT-2) amod(re-entry/NN-4,normal/JJ-3) prep_after(opened/VBN-9,re-entry/NN-4) det(capsule/NN-7,the/DT-6) nsubjpass(opened/VBN-9,capsule/NN-7) auxpass(opened/VBN-9,was/VBD-8) det(crew/NN-12,the/DT-11) nsubjpass(found/VBN-14,crew/NN-12) auxpass(found/VBN-14,was/VBD-13) conj_and(opened/VBN-9,found/VBN-14) acomp(found/VBN-14,dead/JJ-15)

sentence.value: It was discovered that a valve had opened just prior to leaving orbit that had allowed the capsule's atmosphere to vent away into space, suffocating the crew.
sentence.tree: nsubjpass(discovered/VBN-3,It/PRP-1) auxpass(discovered/VBN-3,was/VBD-2) mark(opened/VBN-8,that/IN-4) det(valve/NN-6,a/DT-5) nsubj(opened/VBN-8,valve/NN-6) aux(opened/VBN-8,had/VBD-7) ccomp(discovered/VBN-3,opened/VBN-8) advmod(opened/VBN-8,just/RB-9) prepc_prior_to(opened/VBN-8,leaving/VBG-12) dobj(leaving/VBG-12,orbit/NN-13) nsubj(allowed/VBN-16,that/WDT-14) aux(allowed/VBN-16,had/VBD-15) rcmod(orbit/NN-13,allowed/VBN-16) det(capsule/NN-18,the/DT-17) poss(atmosphere/NN-20,capsule/NN-18) dobj(allowed/VBN-16,atmosphere/NN-20) aux(vent/VB-22,to/TO-21) infmod(atmosphere/NN-20,vent/VB-22) advmod(vent/VB-22,away/RB-23) prep_into(vent/VB-22,space/NN-25) partmod(allowed/VBN-16,suffocating/VBG-27) det(crew/NN-29,the/DT-28) dobj(suffocating/VBG-27,crew/NN-29)

sentence.value: One of Patsayev's hands was found to be bruised, and he may have been trying to shut the valve manually at the time he lost consciousness.
sentence.tree: nsubjpass(found/VBN-7,One/CD-1) poss(hands/NNS-5,Patsayev/NNP-3) prep_of(One/CD-1,hands/NNS-5) auxpass(found/VBN-7,was/VBD-6) aux(bruised/VBN-10,to/TO-8) auxpass(bruised/VBN-10,be/VB-9) xcomp(found/VBN-7,bruised/VBN-10) nsubj(trying/VBG-17,he/PRP-13) aux(trying/VBG-17,may/MD-14) aux(trying/VBG-17,have/VB-15) aux(trying/VBG-17,been/VBN-16) conj_and(found/VBN-7,trying/VBG-17) aux(shut/VB-19,to/TO-18) xcomp(trying/VBG-17,shut/VB-19) det(valve/NN-21,the/DT-20) dobj(shut/VB-19,valve/NN-21) advmod(shut/VB-19,manually/RB-22) det(time/NN-25,the/DT-24) prep_at(shut/VB-19,time/NN-25) nsubj(lost/VBD-27,he/PRP-26) rcmod(time/NN-25,lost/VBD-27) dobj(lost/VBD-27,consciousness/NN-28)

sentence.value: Patsayev's ashes were inurned in the Kremlin Wall on the Red Square in Moscow.
sentence.annotated-sentence: [[Patsayev|Viktor_Patsayev]]'s ashes were inurned in [[the Kremlin Wall|Kremlin_Wall]] on [[the Red Square|Red_Square]] in [[Moscow|Soviet_Union]].
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: [[Patsayev|Viktor_Patsayev]]'s ashes were inurned in the Kremlin Wall on the Red Square in [[Moscow|Soviet_Union]].

sentence.value: He was posthumously awarded the title of Hero of the Soviet Union, the Order of Lenin and the title of Pilot-Cosmonaut of the USSR.
